name: Reflections (itch) (David Zafra)
description:
When was the last time you faced your own demons, your own reflections?

Travel along with Kanjou and Ronri to understand the place that you are, and try to escape. 

In this level you will have to help this protagonist to escape a prison meanwhile you travel across two dimensions and survive enough to understand each other.

This is my first project as a final project in my second year in my studies named: Animation 3D, Games, and Interactive Environments.

I hope you enjoy this little piece of me.

Controls:

F: INTERACT

P: PAUSE.
